name: Tequila Shot
instructions: 1. Wet the back of your hand slightly below your index finger and pour a pinch of salt onto the area.
2. Lick the salt off your hand. This step is important because it lessens the burn of the tequila, by salivation of the mouth.
4. Immediately bite into and suck the lime or lemon. The sour fruit balances and enhances the flavor of the tequila.
